pj.ASIC

Class AbstractCar

  • java.lang.Object
    • pj.ASIC.AbstractCar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Car
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Avante, G70

    public abstract class AbstractCar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Car
    하나의 자동차를 생성하기 윈한 추상 골격 클래스. For example: 
     public class CarName extends AbstractCar implements Car{
 
 }
    Since:
    2021.05.16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Taxol
    See Also:
    G70
